comments.comment: Apa hamuduruwanna Obama thuma gota wada karanna ai
comments.author: cool dutch

replies.replyComment: topiwagea kalakanni handa tama mearata hadagana bari ballo
@Dml Kithsiri üòÇ mithraya Man uda kiyapu dema thamai ayeth kiyanna Wenne

@Dml Kithsiri mama hamduru kenek newei Bana kiyanna Hari Buddha dharmaye dewal pahadili karanna. Mama shraawakayek. Oya oya prashna Hari Haman sanga rathnayakin ahanna. Mata kiyanna awashya une budu hamuduruwo dharmaya deshana Kala misak minissunge sankruthiya wigraha kale na. Anika thamai budu hamuduruwo wiwida ratawal, wiwida sanskuthi wala ayata dharmaya deshana Kala. Dharmaya kaatath podui. Eth aththama uthum sri saddharmaya ahannath Pina thiyenn ona. Hamduru kenek kiyanne budun wadi Maga wadina kenek. Ehema deyak Mata me banen penne na. Patachara demawupiyanta wiruddawa wadakarayek ekka giya. Anthimata budun sarana giya. Budu hamuduruwo uba mehema Kala arama Kala kiyala dos kiwwada. Samajaye waradi kiyanna newei maru katharata diya bindak wage sri saddharmaya bindak me lowata denna Inna me Maha sanga Rathnaya deshana karanne dharmaya newei sankruthiya. Dukai

@Dml Kithsiri moda Katha kiyanna epa mithraya. Weddo thamai lankawe issellama Bana ahuwe. Budun lankawa ta palamu wathawata wadiye mahiyanganayata. Bana kiwwe yaksha gothrika waddanta. Budu haamuduwo aalawaka yakshayata, ambapaalita, angulimaalata, kaali yakinnata, suneetha sopakata me hamotama Bana kiwwa. Pin athi aya Bana ahala niwaradi magata ewi. Nathi aya ehemai. Ekai kawiyen kiyanne " sura ganga watunath diya nopewe pipaseta" kiyala. Eth hamduru kenek kiyanna ona budu hamuduruwo deshana karapu a saddharmaya misak minissu Kalen kaaleta thaman wisin goda Nagaa ganna sankruthiya gana newei

@Dml Kithsiri buddha dharmaya ekak. Sankruthiya wage minissu wisin hada gaththa dewal gana Katha karana eka thawa ekak. Me deka ekak newei. Budu haamuduwo Bana kiwwe na hamotama. Un wahanse hama kenekgema pin balaya wagema pasu giya aathma bhawayan pawa diwesin dakka. Anika thamai me haamuduwo kiyanne Buddha dharmayata  kisima adaalathwayak nathi Opa dupa. Mewa dharma deshana newei

@gawe shakaya awurudu 13ka daruwek dushanaya wela geb gannawa. Ethakota oya kiyanne a awurudu 13 punchi kella lingikathwaya gana dannewath nathuwa prasawa wedanawa widala a daruwa wadanna onada? Buddha dharmaye thiyanawa daruwek geb gaththama palamu sathi 6 eka Mas pidak pamanai, gandhabbhaya ( aathmaya) athulath wela na. A Nisa eka mini marumak newe. Karunakarala dharmaya hodata igana ganna. Oyala oluwen hada gaththa wikara sanskuthi walata me pirisidu dharmaya gaawa ganna epa
@Asanka Jayasundara sanskuthiya ekka dharmaya kawalam Kara ganna epa.

@Dml Kithsiri U  wrong mr. 
Buduhamuduruwo issellama samaje hadanna giyada??  Ne.  Darmaya hariyata dunnoth samaje eken ma hadenawa. Oyath hari dharmaya soyaganna.

@Asanka Jayasundara
Ow ithin eykanam aththa ayth ganu sanhathiyama ekawageth ne. Habai mehe inna ganu lankawey ganunta wada sanwarai kiyala hitheyna awasthath ematai
@Asanka Jayasundara anay manda mam√° inna ratay nam adumen minissu maninna be. Mulika chariyawai hadiyawai thamai
